repo.name: Spooky Services & Partners
repo.description:
Repository for apps by Spooky Services and partners. This is the official way to obtain android apps made by Spooky Services. 
Important Note: * YOU ARE LEAVING THE FOSS AREA * Apps in this repo may not be open source, but any closed-source/proprietary apps will be labeled as "App itself is not open source" in the anti-features list of the app, along with any anti-features that app may have.  This repository is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by F-Droid

antiFeatures: App itself is not open source
apps.description: Flow allows you to send notes and links between your devices seamlessly. This is still in development and it is not production ready.
apps.name: Flow by Spooky Services
apps.summary: Seamless notes and links sharing across devices

en-US.whatsNew:
First version:

- Authenticates with Spooky Services
- Send text messages between devices
